title: Man Come Into Egypt

tokens.lyric: There is a man come into Egypt

lines.raw: [Dm]There is a man come into Egypt

tokens.lyric: And Moses is his name.

lines.raw: [G]And Moses is his name.

tokens.lyric: When he saw the grief upon us,

lines.raw: [Dm]When he saw the grief upon us,

tokens.lyric: In his heart there burned a flame -

lines.raw: [G]In his heart there burned a flame -

tokens.lyric: In his heart there burned a flame, oh Lord,

lines.raw: [Dm]In his heart there burned a flame, oh Lord,

tokens.lyric: In his heart there burned a flame.

lines.raw: [G]In his heart there burned a flame.

tokens.lyric: When he saw the grief upon us,

lines.raw: [Dm]When he saw the grief upon us,

tokens.lyric: In his heart there burned a flame.

lines.raw: [A]In his heart there burned a flame.

tokens.lyric: There is a man come into Egypt,

lines.raw: [Dm]There is a man come into Egypt,

tokens.lyric: His eyes are full of light.

lines.raw: [G]His eyes are full of light.

tokens.lyric: Like the sun come up in Egypt,

lines.raw: [Dm]Like the sun come up in Egypt,

tokens.lyric: Come to drive away the night -

lines.raw: [A]Come to drive away the night -

tokens.lyric: Come to drive away the night, oh Lord,

lines.raw: [Dm]Come to drive away the night, oh Lord,

tokens.lyric: Come to drive away the night.

lines.raw: [G]Come to drive away the night.

tokens.lyric: Like the sun come up in Egypt,

lines.raw: [Dm]Like the sun come up in Egypt,

tokens.lyric: Come to drive away the night.

lines.raw: [A]Come to drive away the night.

tokens.lyric: There is a man come into Egypt,

lines.raw: [Dm]There is a man come into Egypt,

tokens.lyric: He's come for you and me.

lines.raw: [G]He's come for you and me.

tokens.lyric: On his lips a word is singing,

lines.raw: [Dm]On his lips a word is singing,

tokens.lyric: And the world is 'liberty' -

lines.raw: [A]And the world is 'liberty' -

tokens.lyric: And the world is 'liberty', oh Lord,

lines.raw: [Dm]And the world is 'liberty', oh Lord,

tokens.lyric: And the world is 'liberty'.

lines.raw: [G]And the world is 'liberty'.

tokens.lyric: On his lips a word is singing,

lines.raw: [Dm]On his lips a word is singing,

tokens.lyric: And the world is 'liberty'.

lines.raw: [A]And the world is 'liberty'.

tokens.lyric: There is a man come into Egypt,

lines.raw: [Dm]There is a man come into Egypt,

tokens.lyric: To stir the souls of men.

lines.raw: [G]To stir the souls of men.

tokens.lyric: We will follow him to freedom,

lines.raw: [Dm]We will follow him to freedom,

tokens.lyric: And never wear those chains again -

lines.raw: [A]And never wear those chains again -

tokens.lyric: Never wear those chains again,

lines.raw: [Dm]Never wear those chains again,

tokens.lyric: Oh Lord, Never wear those chains again.

lines.raw: [G]Oh Lord, Never wear those chains again.

tokens.lyric: We will follow him to freedom, And

lines.raw: [Dm]We will follow him to freedom, And

tokens.lyric: never wear those chains again.

lines.raw: [A]never wear those chains again.

source:
{title: Man Come Into Egypt}
{key: Dm}
{reviewed: false}

{section: Verse 1}
[Dm]There is a man come into Egypt
[G]And Moses is his name.
[Dm]When he saw the grief upon us,
[G]In his heart there burned a flame -

{{section: Verse 2}
[Dm]In his heart there burned a flame, oh Lord,
[G]In his heart there burned a flame.
[Dm]When he saw the grief upon us,
[A]In his heart there burned a flame.

{{section: Verse 3}
[Dm]There is a man come into Egypt,
[G]His eyes are full of light.
[Dm]Like the sun come up in Egypt,
[A]Come to drive away the night -

{{section: Verse 4}
[Dm]Come to drive away the night, oh Lord,
[G]Come to drive away the night.
[Dm]Like the sun come up in Egypt,
[A]Come to drive away the night.

{{section: Verse 5}
[Dm]There is a man come into Egypt,
[G]He's come for you and me.
[Dm]On his lips a word is singing,
[A]And the world is 'liberty' -

{{section: Verse 6}
[Dm]And the world is 'liberty', oh Lord,
[G]And the world is 'liberty'.
[Dm]On his lips a word is singing,
[A]And the world is 'liberty'.

{{section: Verse 7}
[Dm]There is a man come into Egypt,
[G]To stir the souls of men.
[Dm]We will follow him to freedom,
[A]And never wear those chains again -

{{section: Verse 8}
[Dm]Never wear those chains again,
[G]Oh Lord, Never wear those chains again.
[Dm]We will follow him to freedom, And
[A]never wear those chains again.
